name: using-hologram-material
description:
This component, created by Anderson Mancini, represents a holographic material in a Three.js environment. 
 * It provides a visually stunning holographic effect with customizable properties such as fresnel amount, opacity, 
 * scanline size, hologram brightness, signal speed, and hologram color. The component is designed to be used 
 * within a React Three Fiber scene for immersive 3D graphics.
